entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
